existing_features.title:
Update the header navigation dropdown labeled “Industries We Serve” to include exactly these 10 items (and keep each item linking to its corresponding industry page route):
1) Corporate & Enterprise Offices → /industries/corporate-enterprise
2) Education & Digital Classrooms → /industries/education
3) Healthcare Facilities → /industries/healthcare
4) Manufacturing & Industrial Facilities → /industries/manufacturing
5) Government & Public Sector → /industries/government
6) Hospitality & Convention Centers → /industries/hospitality
7) Banking & Financial Institution → /industries/banking
8) Training Centers & Skill Development Institutes → /industries/training-centers
9) Retail & Commercial Spaces → /industries/retail
10) Live Events & Corporate Events → /industries/live-events

Ensure the dropdown label text matches the list above exactly (including singular/plural wording), and that both desktop dropdown and mobile navigation render the same labels.

Replace the content for each of the 10 industry pages in the content registry (frontend/src/content/pages.ts) so each page renders the user-provided copy for that industry, using the existing ContentPage + ContentRenderer block types.

For each industry pageId below, set content.title to exactly the industry item name (matching the dropdown label), and render these content parts in this order:
- Headline (as prominent text near the top of the page content)
- Subhead
- Call to action text: “Request a consultation · Get a project proposal” (render as two links to the existing /contact route, preserving the visible text)
- Overview (paragraphs)
- Core Services (each service as a distinct sub-heading plus supporting bullet points; include the “Benefit:” line for each service as an emphasis/bold-style block)
- Our Delivery Approach (bulleted list)
- Typical Deployment Locations (bulleted list)
- Why Clients Choose Speedlight / Why Institutions Choose Speedlight / etc. (bulleted list; use the exact section title from the user’s copy for that industry)
- Next Steps (include the closing sentence + the two CTA links to /contact, preserving visible text)

Industry pages to update (pageId → title):
- corporate-enterprise → “Corporate & Enterprise Offices”
- education → “Education & Digital Classrooms”
- healthcare → “Healthcare Facilities”
- manufacturing → “Manufacturing & Industrial Facilities”
- government → “Government & Public Sector”
- hospitality → “Hospitality & Convention Centers”
- banking → “Banking & Financial Institution”
- training-centers → “Training Centers & Skill Development Institutes”
- retail → “Retail & Commercial Spaces”
- live-events → “Live Events & Corporate Events”

Use the exact English text provided by the user for each industry’s Headline, Subhead, Overview, Core Services, Delivery Approach, Typical Deployment Locations, Why Choose section, and Next Steps.
